description.value:
You’re a terrifying sight when you toss your opponents around.

Prerequisites: Str 13, Intimidate 5 ranks.

Benefit: Once per round when your attack roll to perform a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#bull-rush]{bull rush}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#reposition]{reposition}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#trip]{trip} combat maneuver exceeds the necessary result to succeed by 5 or more, you can also attempt an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i]{Intimidate} check to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i#demoralize]{demoralize} the target. If you succeed at the combat maneuver but don’t exceed the needed result by 5 or more, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to demoralize your target as if you’d exceeded the KAC by 5 or more.
